Could not open a connection to your authentication agent

2014-12-18 • wangd933 • git

way 1:

  1. ssh-agent
  2. eval ‘ssh-agent -s’
  3. ssh-add ‘your id_rsa’

way 2:

  1. ssh-agent
  2. eval $(ssh-agent)
  3. ssh-add ‘your id_rsa`

reference:

1.could-not-open-a-connection-to-your-authentication-agent
2.fix-could-not-open-a-connection-to-your-authentication-agent-when-using-ssh-add

飞行家
